author: donaldp
msg: Removed excess States and made startup using Creating/Created states to compliment shutdowns DESTROY/DESTROYED states.

msg: Make sure entry is invalidated at creation

author: donaldp
msg: Use LifecycleHelper to run Listeners lifecycle.

author: donaldp
msg: Make the entry passed into lifecycle helper an Object thus making it possible to pass in container specific objects (that get forwarded to accessor) to run component through lifecycle.
